title: T206 Eddie Collins Old Mill (OFF FOR GRADING)
author: B O'Brien

posts.post_title: T206 Eddie Collins Old Mill (OFF FOR GRADING)
posts.post_content:
Hello all,
I upgraded this Collins card a couple weeks ago, so looking to sell my extra Collins Old Mill.

The Collins card was in an old PSA holder with a 2 on it.  It looks a lot more like three to me.  No paper loss.  Corner damage top right, surface crease right hair high. tiny surface indent (not a hole) on the right side, southeast of the ear, as you look at it.  The back is bright white and looking great.

Lajoie is a very nice and bright card, and has also been in a PSA 3 holder in the past.  TRADED

Collins is off for grading, I will relist upon return!
The Lajoie has been traded!!!
Paypal is prefered, emails come first.

Thanks,
Bob
[url]upperhandisforemost@yahoo.com[/url]

[URL="http://s588.photobucket.com/albums/ss329/upperhandisforemost/Eddie%20Collins%20cards/?action=view&current=T206CollinsOMFront.jpg"][IMG]http://i588.photobucket.com/albums/ss329/upperhandisforemost/Eddie%20Collins%20cards/T206CollinsOMFront.jpg[/IMG][/URL][URL="http://s588.photobucket.com/albums/ss329/upperhandisforemost/Eddie%20Collins%20cards/?action=view&current=T206CollinsOMBack.jpg"][IMG]http://i588.photobucket.com/albums/ss329/upperhandisforemost/Eddie%20Collins%20cards/T206CollinsOMBack.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

[URL="http://s588.photobucket.com/albums/ss329/upperhandisforemost/T206%20Backs%20Line%20Newest/?action=view&current=T206SC150649Lajoiefront.jpg"][IMG]http://i588.photobucket.com/albums/ss329/upperhandisforemost/T206%20Backs%20Line%20Newest/T206SC150649Lajoiefront.jpg[/IMG][/URL][URL="http://s588.photobucket.com/albums/ss329/upperhandisforemost/T206%20Backs%20Line%20Newest/?action=view&current=T206SC150649Lajoieback.jpg"][IMG]http://i588.photobucket.com/albums/ss329/upperhandisforemost/T206%20Backs%20Line%20Newest/T206SC150649Lajoieback.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

Bump for a big price drop!  Going to SGC to get a new holder if not sold this weekend.
Thanks,
Bob
